mapper.select: SELECT user_id, username, password, status FROM sys_user WHERE username = #{username} AND del_flag = 0
SELECT user_id, dept_id, username, nickname, user_type, phone, email, sex, status FROM sys_user WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND del_flag = 0

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.phone, u.create_time, u.status FROM sys_user AS u, sys_user_role AS sur
sur.role_id = #{qo.roleId} AND sur.user_id = u.user_id AND del_flag = 0 AND u.user_id != 1
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qo.username},'%')
AND u.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qo.phone},'%')
ORDER BY u.create_time

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.nickname, u.email, u.phone, u.create_time, u.status FROM sys_user AS u WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM sys_user_role AS sur WHERE sur.role_id = #{qo.roleId} AND sur.user_id = u.user_id) AND u.del_flag = 0 AND u.user_id != 1
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qo.username},'%')
AND u.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qo.phone},'%')
ORDER BY u.create_time

SELECT u.user_id, u.username, u.nickname, u.phone, u.create_time, u.status, d.dept_name FROM sys_user u LEFT JOIN sys_dept d ON d.dept_id = u.dept_id
u.del_flag = 0 AND u.user_id != 1
AND u.dept_id IN (${qo.deptIdsStr})
AND u.username LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qo.username},'%')
AND u.phone LIKE CONCAT('%',#{qo.phone},'%')
AND u.status = #{qo.status}
AND u.create_time BETWEEN #{qo.beginTime} AND #{qo.endTime}
